text:
*NOT* #antivax. Just facts.

Best way to protect healthy young #children from #COVID19 is to *NOT* #vaccinate them (but *instead* to get #vaccine doses to vulnerable adults -- & those more likely to spread)

https://t.co/lWXgSJoRZN via @adamhfinn & @rickmalley in @washingtonpost https://t.co/sFbVsfxR4w
